name: Galaxy Killer
description:
A game in which you need to "feed" a black hole, which will later destroy the galaxy!

The black hole has a mind. You have to give what she asks for!

The game was made for a game jam!

Unfortunately ,iI didn't have much time(about 2 days). Therefore, there is no audio in the game! 

Assets that were used:  

  • Planets
  • Asteroids
  • Outline
  • SkyBox
